segments.text: Do you do a lot of your shopping online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . I like looking on the internet at what ’ s available , but I usually prefer to actually see and touch what I ’ m buying before I pay for it . Sometimes , I ’ ll look at something in a shop , but later buy it online if it ’ s cheaper . You don ’ t like buying things online , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I ’ m a little worried about security . You never who ’ s trying to find out your codes and passwords . Aren ’ t you worry about that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . I know that it happens , but if you buy from reputable companies with secure websites , you should be ok . Even though I use online shopping facilities , I don ’ t think it ’ s the best way to shop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m surprised to hear you say that . I thought you loved anything technological .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do . I ’ m a big fan of using new technology , but I don ’ t want to sit in front of a computer screen all day . I think people need to get out and interact with other people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , how about coming to the department store with me ? I want to see if there are any new summer clothes on sale yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I ’ d love to join you . Can we stop by the computer store ? I just want to see if they have something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . While you ’ re in the computer store . I will visit the book store opposite . I like to browse through their books if they have anything interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I ’ Ve finished online . Let ’ s go . I ’ ll just get some money and my credit card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for reminding me . I had forgotten to get mine .
segments.speaker: S1
